rationale: Almost qualifies for Vulnerable under criterion B2 as extent of occurrence <5,000 km², area of occupancy <500 km², and habitat quality is expected to continue to decline. However, it is known from more than 10 locations so fails to fully meet the requirements for a threatened category.
evaluator: Snoeks, J. (Freshwater Fish Red List Authority) & Darwall, W. (Freshwater Biodiversity Assessment Programme)
